name: Recurring Revenue Conference
content: Join us at the 7th Recurring Revenue Conference on November 9th at the Culver City Hilton! Connect with SaaS and subscription leaders from across the country and gain insights into "lean growth" and "focused retention strategies" for the changing tech landscape. Don't miss 20+ sessions, keynotes, networking, and valuable discussions on the future of SaaS and Cloud. Presented by Sutton Capital Partners, this event promises to equip you with the latest trends and strategies for success in uncertain times. Keynotes speakers include Chris Webb, CEO of ChowNow, CeCe Morken, former CEO of Headspace, and Marten Mickos, CEO of HackerOne. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1968762-0?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 AM - 7:30 PM Venue Details: Hilton Los Angeles Culver City, 6161 West Centinela Avenue, Culver City, California, 90230, United States Price: General Admission: USD 399.00
